summary: A group of German solders fight on the front line in France at the end of World War I.
cast: Fritz Kampers|Gustav Diessl|Hans-Joachim Möbis|Claus Clausen|Jackie Monnier|Hanna Hoessrich|Else Heller|Aribert Mog|Gustav Püttjer|André Saint-Germain|Vladimir Sokoloff|Ilse Trautschold|Emil Wabschke
director: Director: Georg Wilhelm Pabst (as G.W. Pabst)
title: Cuatro de infantería
